alert.note: Alert for Duval; Jim Wells; Live Oak (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 7:18PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN DUVAL... NORTHWESTERN JIM WELLS AND SOUTH CENTRAL LIVE OAK COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM CDT... At 718 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rancho De La Parita, or 15 miles north of San Diego, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Midway, Tecalote, Annarose, Rosita, Westdale, and Rancho De La Parita. This includes the following highways... US Highway 281 between mile markers 644 and 662. US Highway 59 between mile markers 762 and 764. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
